channel.title: CVE Feed for Icegram -- Icegram
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Icegram -- Icegram

item.title: CVE-2024-43272|2024-08-19T18:00:52.607Z -- icegram -- icegram
item.description: Missing Authentication for Critical Function vulnerability in icegram Icegram allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Icegram: from n/a through 3.1.24.

item.title: CVE-2024-43344|2024-08-18T13:20:04.506Z -- icegram -- icegram
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Icegram allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Icegram: from n/a through 3.1.25.

item.title: CVE-2024-21748|2024-07-17T15:48:18.341Z -- icegram -- icegram
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Icegram.This issue affects Icegram: from n/a through 3.1.21.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Icegram.This issue affects Icegram: from n/a through 3.1.21.
